template.title: Template
template.warn_text: Are you sure? This action will overwrite the current site, and cannot be undone.
template.save_text: Add a new template or update an existing one.
template.select_text: Select a template or use one of your sites as a starting point.

behavior_context.title: Helper functions for accessing and modifying site state. For example: helpers.getComponent(site, 'mysite-id-1')
behavior_context.component: A reference to the component the behavior is attached to.
behavior_context.context: The site context, short for: site.context
behavior_context.args: Custom arguments provided in the editor. Access via: args.MyArg
behavior_context.setContent: (component: IComponent {'|'} undefined, content: string | undefined): void
behavior_context.setState: (component: IComponent {'|'} undefined, field: string, value: IComponentState): void
behavior_context.setIsInput: (component: IComponent, name: string, value: string): void
behavior_context.setCustomStyle: (component: IComponent {'|'} undefined, prop: Css, value: string): void
behavior_context.getCustomStyle: (component: IComponent {'|'} undefined, prop: Css, value: string): string {'|'} undefined

build.scratch_text: This is a sandbox for testing the builder, the site cannot be deployed. Connect a Site API to persist and deploy sites.

scroll_into_view.margin: The event triggers when the component is margin from the top of the window (i.e. 50% or 100px). Valid units are % and px. Default to 0%.
scroll_into_view.direction: The event triggers when the component is scrolled into view from the given direction. Options are up, down, and both. Default to down.

build.behavior_builtin_uneditable: This is a builtin behavior, which cannot be edited.
build.behavior_info: JavaScript code that runs when an event is triggered. Some preset functions and context variables are available:
build.svg_info: Copy/Paste your SVG here, or edit manually.
build.title: Build
build.unsaved: Some changes may not be saved, are you sure you want to exit?
build.preview_saving: Please wait until your site is saved
build.preview_banner: Preview mode. Click here to go back.
build.content_info: This content is not displayed because the component has children. You can copy it to another component, or remove the children.
build.role_info: ARIA roles provide semantic meaning to content for screen readers and other tools. If possible, it's better to use an HTML tag.
build.attr_info: If checked, the input will be added to the HTML: <div my-input="value">
build.site_error_text_1: Oops! It seems that an error occurred while loading your site. The specific error message is shown below:
build.site_error_text_2: You can take the following actions to resolve the issue:
build.delete_page: Are you sure you want to delete the page, and all its associated components? You can use the undo command to get the page back.
build.save_error_text: You have exceeded a data limit for the site. You can export data and purchase an upgraded site, or refresh the page to revert recent changes
build.save_warning: Warning - unsaved changes are not recoverable.
build.save_history: You have exceeded the history limit. You can export data and purchase an upgraded site, or clear the history. Deleted history cannot be recovered.
build.save_text: We were unable to save your site due to a server error. Please try again later or contact support to solve the issue. If you leave this page recent changes may be lost.
build.confirm_reset_text: Are you sure? This will clear the site, and cannot be undone.
build.confirm_import_text: This will overwrite the current active site!
build.select_color_info: Checked theme colors will show in the color picker (maximum 16 colors).
build.set_home_text: Are you sure you want to set this page as home page? You can use the undo command to revert this action.
build.route-not-found: This page is shown when a user visits a route that does not exist.
build.source_info: Choose an existing page to duplicate.
build.component_paste_failed: Can't paste into a component with text content

breakpoint.title: Breakpoint
breakpoint.hint_between: Styles added will apply between {minWidth}px and {maxWidth}px.
breakpoint.hint_min: Styles added will apply at {minWidth}px and up, unless a larger breakpoint applies.
breakpoint.hint_max: Styles added will apply at {maxWidth}px and down, unless a smaller breakpoint applies.
breakpoint.hint_default: Styles added will apply at all sizes when no other breakpoints are applicable.
breakpoint.add_text: You cannot remove a breakpoint once itâ€™s created. Are you sure you want to create a new breakpoint?

errors.min_width: Min width must be greater than 0
errors.max_width: Max width must be greater than 0
errors.overlapped: Breakpoints must not overlap with each other

build.paste_replace_info: Replace this page's root component with the component copied from the clipboard.

theme.title: Theme
theme.remove_favicon_text: This will remove the favicon from your site, but the image will still exist in the asset library.
theme.favicon_text: Icon shown in the browser tab when your site is open. Recommended size 64x64.
theme.head: Head Metadata
theme.head_text: Load external scripts/styles, and global metadata. Overridable by each page.
theme.edit_meta_text: Page metadata entries show up in the <head> section. Each page can override the default metadata.

not_found.title: Not Found
not_found.text: Sorry, we can't find what you're looking for.

style.child_info: Set styles for this component's children
style.child_missing: Some children have been removed, but their styles are still present.
style.child_missing_current: This component corresponding to this selector is not present.

toolbar.no_fonts: No fonts, click to add in the theme menu

history.title: History
history.subtitle: Navigate command history. New actions clear future commands, so be careful to avoid losing progress.
history.clear_text: Are you sure? This will clear all undo/redo history, and cannot be reversed.

file.export_text: Save a copy of your site as a text (JSON) file. You can import it again any time!

errors.site_restore_fail: Unable to restore the site. If this error persists, please contact support at support{'@'}samatech.tw
errors.site_format: Site format version mismatch. The site imported correctly, but something might be broken. If so, contact support.
errors.site_subdomain_format: Subdomain can only contain lowercase characters, numbers, and dashes.
errors.Unauthorized: Your session has expired, please log in again.
errors.theme_var_name_missing: Theme variable must have a name.
errors.theme_var_name_unique: Theme variable name must be unique.
errors.font_fallback_missing: Non-native font must have a fallback font.
errors.input_name_length: Input name must be at least 1 character.
errors.password_length: Password must be between 8 and 50 characters.
errors.invalid_file: Select a valid file to upload.
errors.site_missing: Select a site to associate the asset with.
errors.asset_upload_failed: Something went wrong, please try again later.
errors.invalid_domain: Invalid domain. Don't include the 'http://' part, for example: mysite.com
errors.invalid_name_length: Name must be at least 2 letters
errors.invalid_name_format: Name must be alphanumeric/Chinese characters, spaces, or , . ( ) / -.
errors.site_confirm: The name of the site does not match.
errors.select_template: Unable to load template, try again later or contact support.
errors.create_ecpay_token: Unable to confirm, check your info or try again later.
errors.ecpay_payment: Payment failed, check your info or contact support.
errors.confirm_email: Unable to confirm, try again later or resend the code from the Settings page.
errors.LocalSiteExists: The site name is already taken.
errors.SiteCheckoutNotActive: This checkout is already processing or expired. Review your purchase history or contact support.
errors.UserExists: User with the same email already exists.
errors.NoAvailableSiteServer: Sorry, we are currently over capacity. You can try purchasing a lower tier site, or wait until more space is available.
errors.site_servers_full: Sorry, we are currently over capacity. Please try again later.
errors.AssetUsageExceeded: Storage limit exceeded, you can upgrade your site for more storage, or review and delete old assets in the {0}
errors.SiteHasAssets: Cannot delete site with assets. Ensure all site assets have been deleted from the {0} first.
errors.InvalidFormData: Invalid input, please double check your submission.
